question: According to Patrick Camilleri, what combination of factors will redefine enterprise scalability in 2026?
answer: Generative AI and sustainable infrastructure
explanation: Patrick Camilleri notes, 'In 2026, AWSs fusion of generative AI and sustainable infrastructure will redefine enterprise scalability.'
